TopicTitle: Great Apollo video about the guidance computer and MIT

Articles.Content: Great video about MIT and the making of the Apollo guidance computer.
Thanks for the link. Will watch this later.
This is a very good video. I have been enjoying the whole "moon Machine" series.
A very good series indeed. I can also suggest From Earth to Moon series, The Right Stuff movie and the BBC series Space Race.

From the Earth to the Moon is one of my favorite series to watch, go to start watching it again if a few weeks. I'm seen The Right Stuff more times than I can count but don't recall seeing Space Race. I will have to check that one out.

"Moon Machine" is one of my favorite series.

I would also suggest "In the Shadow of the Moon".

From the Earth to the Moon is one of my favorite series to watch, go to start watching it again if a few weeks. I'm seen The Right Stuff more times than I can count but don't recall seeing Space Race. I will have to check that one out.

BBC's Space Race focus com Serguei Korolev and Wernher von Braun careers and the challenges both overcome. Very good indeed, I have sure you will like it a lot!

"Moon Machine" is one of my favorite series.

I would also suggest "In the Shadow of the Moon".

I'll check this right now!

What strikes me the most in this series is how whiney the developers where.

But it sure is good to see how much software development has benefited from the program.
Gonna check all those series when I have the chance.
